sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comtssyslogsummary ( occrrnc_de , svc_nm , method_nm , creat_co , updt_co , rdcnt , delete_co , outpt_co , error_co ) VALUES ( #occrrncDe# , #svcNm# , #methodNm# , #creatCo# , #updtCo# , #rdcnt# , #deleteCo# , #outptCo# , #errorCo# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comtssyslogsummary SET occrrnc_de = #occrrncDe# , svc_nm = #svcNm# , method_nm = #methodNm# , creat_co = #creatCo# , updt_co = #updtCo# , rdcnt = #rdcnt# , delete_co = #deleteCo# , outpt_co = #outptCo# , error_co = #errorCo# WHERE 1 = 1 AND occrrnc_de = #occrrncDe# AND svc_nm = #svcNm# AND method_nm = #methodNm#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM comtssyslogsummary WHERE 1 = 1 AND occrrnc_de = #occrrncDe# AND svc_nm = #svcNm# AND method_nm = #methodNm#
sqlMap.select: SELECT occrrnc_de , svc_nm , method_nm , creat_co , updt_co , rdcnt , delete_co , outpt_co , error_co FROM COMTSSYSLOGSUMMARY WHERE occrrnc_de = #occrrncDe# AND svc_nm = #svcNm# AND method_nm = #methodNm#

SELECT A.OCCRRNC_DE , A.SVC_NM , A.METHOD_NM , A.CREAT_CO , A.UPDT_CO , A.RDCNT , A.DELETE_CO , A.OUTPT_CO , A.ERROR_CO FROM ( SELECT OCCRRNC_DE , SVC_NM , METHOD_NM , CREAT_CO , UPDT_CO , RDCNT , DELETE_CO , OUTPT_CO , ERROR_CO , ROWNUM FROM COMTSSYSLOGSUMMARY WHERE 1=1
OCCRRNC_DE = #searchKeyword#
SVC_NM LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY OCCRRNC_DE DESC , SVC_NM DESC , METHOD_NM DESC ) A WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN #firstIndex# AND #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM COMTSSYSLOGSUMMARY WHERE 1=1
OCCRRNC_DE = #searchKeyword#
SVC_NM LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
